data.title: Magazines & Newspapers
data.meta_description: Find resources for reading digital magazines and newspapers
data.text:
On this page you’ll find resources for reading digital magazines and newspapers. To connect directly to your favourite resource, click the ‘connect’ button. Or, get oriented with a new-to-you resource by clicking ‘more info.’ Some resources have a free app to install on your device—please check your device’s app store.

OverDrive (and Libby app)

Read your favourite digital magazines free on our library website or through OverDrive's Libby app.

PressReader

Read most major Canadian newspapers and magazines and nearly 1000 international titles.

The New York Times

Get 72 hours of unlimited article access to NYTimes.com and app. Simply renew when the loan expires.

Globe and Mail Historical

History at your fingertips. Read full-page reproductions of the complete newspaper from 1844 to 2019.

CBC Corner

A digital portal to unique Canadian and local content including news, TV and radio shows, podcasts & more.

L'espace Radio-Canada

Découvrir du contenu d'ici incluant nouvelles, reportages locaux, émissions de télévision, et bien plus.
